org.jfree.chart.event

Interface AnnotationChangeListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractXYItemRenderer, CandlestickRenderer, CategoryPlot, ClusteredXYBarRenderer, CombinedDomainCategoryPlot, CombinedDomainXYPlot, CombinedRangeCategoryPlot, CombinedRangeXYPlot, CompassPlot, ContourPlot, CyclicXYItemRenderer, DefaultXYItemRenderer, DeviationRenderer, DialPlot, FastScatterPlot, HighLowRenderer, MeterPlot, MultiplePiePlot, PiePlot, PiePlot3D, Plot, PolarPlot, RingPlot, SamplingXYLineRenderer, SpiderWebPlot, StackedXYAreaRenderer, StackedXYAreaRenderer2, StackedXYBarRenderer, StandardXYItemRenderer, ThermometerPlot, VectorRenderer, WaferMapPlot, WindItemRenderer, XYAreaRenderer, XYAreaRenderer2, XYBarRenderer, XYBlockRenderer, XYBoxAndWhiskerRenderer, XYBubbleRenderer, XYDifferenceRenderer, XYDotRenderer, XYErrorRenderer, XYLine3DRenderer, XYLineAndShapeRenderer, XYPlot, XYShapeRenderer, XYSplineRenderer, XYStepAreaRenderer, XYStepRenderer, YIntervalRenderer

    public interface AnnotationChangeListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    The interface that must be supported by classes that wish to receive notification of changes to an Annotation.
    Since:
    1.0.14

      Receives notification of an annotation change event.
